document.full_text: an american airlines flight bound for san francisco with 166 people on board made an emergency landing in las vegas on friday after the crew smelled smoke in the cockpit, a federal aviation spokesman said.
document.title: american airlines flight diverted to vegas over smoke
lines_and_colors: an american airlines flight bound for san francisco with 166 people on board made an emergency landing in las vegas on friday after the crew smelled smoke in the cockpit, a federal aviation spokesman said.
